title: Compostable Bags, Liners and More | Natur-Bag® 100% Compostable Bags
description: Natur-Bag® certified compostable bags and liners aid in zero-waste and organics diversion efforts. We're committed to creating a sustainbe future.
cleaned_text: At Natur-Tec®, we pride our selves in supporting our clients beyond our products.
